effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 811,654 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 327,742.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

spells.description:
Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 248,120 damage and granting them 1,425 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,457 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 196 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
High Priestess's Ceremonial Drape

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ruined Crest of Lordaeron
